reviews.comment: Very clear and helpful for beginners.
Good course but a bit too fast-paced.
Basic content, useful for beginners only.
Well structured and easy to follow.
Advanced and detailed, great for experienced devs.
React was never so fun! Thanks!
Learned a lot, although some parts were tough.
